Controls (Keyboard and mouse / Xbox Controller)

Movement

Pause - P / Menu Button

Move  - WASD / Left Stick

Look - Mouse / Right Stick

Jump - Space / A

Run - Shift / Press Left Stick

Aim - Right mouse Button / Left Trigger

Interact with objects - Tab / Y

Abilities (Once Collected)

Spin Attack - Q / B

Shoot - LMB / Right Trigger

Switch Weapons - [ & ] / D-Pad Left & Right

Walk up steep slopes - R / Right Bumper

Glide (When in air) - E / Right Bumper

Dig - CTRL / X
